pages.text: Those stones left from the shattered leak seem to hold the key to something significant, though I have yet to discern what exactly. When I touch the stones, I experience a similar light, dream-like sensation, albeit much fainter than when near the leak.

Moreover, when I hold them close to each other, they generate a peculiar, ghostly blue field between them. Could this be flux? I must delve deeper to understand. Here's my hypothesis: If I aim to obtain a sample of flux, I must somehow contain it. What if I were to place a scarred stone inside a bottle, then position it atop a flux leak?
Would the flux somehow remain confined within the bottle?
